Megatron/Terrorsaur:





Megatron paused. He wasn't going to go any further than the first set 
of trees. He looked around. He could smell Rowdy Wolf. His flute 
playing had stopped. 


Terrorsaur saw a figure below. It was a big figure, heavy shouldered. 
He transformed to robot mode and lowered down to it. It was Rowdy 
Wolf, but something was different. 

Rowdy Wolf turned his head to Terrorsaur and stared at him coldly. On 
the side of his face, there was a plate of mismatching metal attached 
to it, like someone wiht a bad skill in repairing. There was also a 
mess of metal parts on his left arm. 

"Rowdy Wolf?" Terrorsaur said, studying Rowdy Wolf. "What happened?"

"I stayed," he replied. "I risked my life for you."

Terrorsaur squinted. There was something in the air, and it didn't 
feel right. 

"Well, are you damaged?" he asked.

Rowdy Wolf pulled his arm up, armed with his rifle. "Where is 
Quickstrike?"

"I don't know," Terrorsaur replied. "I think he's dead. You see, 
there was a battle and he was possible caught."

Rowdy Wolf eyed him for a short while. "Tell Megatron I want to speak 
to him."

"I can show you to him," Terrorsaur commented. 

"Bring him here!" Rowdy Wolf shouted, then fired.




Megatron lifted his head, hearing a shot. There was silence a few 
seconds after, then another shot. It sounded like Terrorsaur's marks. 
There was another moment of silence. 

He looked around. He saw something falling towards him. It was a 
bright. Within the moment, he saw it was Terrorsaur. His metal body 
slammed into the ground and slid past KitKat and himself. There was 
heavy damage to his shoulder.

"He wants to talk to you," Terrorsaur said to Megatron, only lifting 
his head.
